# Fire Breath (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a chili pepper)

**Range:** 15 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** 1 round/level or until discharged; see text

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 221

Up to thrice during this spellâ€™s duration, you can belch forth a cone of fire as a standard action. The first cone deals 4d6 points of fire damage to every creature in the area. The second cone of flame deals 2d6 points of fire damage to every creature in the area. The third cone of flame deals 1d6 points of fire damage to every creature in the area. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. After the third cone of flame, the spell ends.
